column4: hi, which command I can download a sequence of files from internet?
for example i want download http://www.site.com/1.jpg up to 100.jpg
whats the command? with a for loop?
wget and for loop can do that
for((i=1;i<100;i++)); do wget url/$i; done if you use bash
works like a charm THX a million!!
what are any other cool tricks with wget?
I don't know, maybe you should look at its manpage
BlackBishop, i dont like downloader, terminal works better specially sometimes i am on the road I can ssh into my computer with my iphone
BlackBishop, I know the gui method i just want to know how to download using my iphone
well, wget can download links from text file too ;)
